sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man .

sentences.english: 10th, Meng Xiangbin The wind whinny, the river water is cold, the brave soldier never to returns.
sentences.chinese: 风萧萧，江水寒，壮士一去不复返。

sentences.english: Just like yesterday , which can never return .
sentences.chinese: 就像昨天，如壮士一去兮不复还。

sentences.english: Then he can rob his house.
sentences.chinese: 必先摆捆住那壮士，才可以抢夺他的家。

sentences.english: The red land with thousand of heroes sleeping in.
sentences.chinese: 红色故土长眠千万壮士英豪。

sentences.english: And Meshelemiah had sons and brethren, strong men, eighteen.
sentences.chinese: 米施利米雅的儿子和弟兄都是壮士，共十八人。

sentences.english: You cannot leave, real warrior never quits.
sentences.chinese: 你不能走，真正的壮士决不会撤退。

sentences.english: The most solid, and set up men die namely, namely heave name already.
sentences.chinese: 戍死者固十六七，且壮士不死即已，死即举大名耳。

sentences.english: Meshelemiah had sons and relatives, who were able men-18 in all.
sentences.chinese: 米施利米雅的儿子和弟兄都是壮士，共十八人。

sentences.english: And Meshelemiah had sons and brethren， strong men， eighteen.
sentences.chinese: 米施利米雅的儿子和弟兄都是壮士，共十八人。

sentences.english: Quickly catch up with the battlefield, Eight Hundred Heroes do take an example.
sentences.chinese: 快快赶上战场，拿八百壮士做榜样。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold.
sentences.chinese: 烈火试真金，困难炼壮士。

sentences.english: The fire is the test of gold ; adversity of strong men.

sentences.english: In fact, no one can enter a strong mans house.
sentences.chinese: 没有人能进壮士家里抢夺他的家具。
